definition: to breathe/to suck in/to absorb/to inhale
cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke

sentences.english: Nathan noted that the study can't prove that smoking causes diabetes.
sentences.chinese: 内森说此项研究不能证明吸烟会导致糖尿病。

sentences.english: And you know what, the waste you exhale when you smoke is more toxic to cause cancer.
sentences.chinese: 你知道吗，你吸烟时呼出的废气更加具有致癌性质。

sentences.english: Speaking: discuss the following questions about smoking in the workplace.
sentences.chinese: 就下列关于在工作场所吸烟的问题进行讨论。

sentences.english: The commercial is part of the government's new campaign against smoking.
sentences.chinese: 商业局是政府反对吸烟运动的一部分。

sentences.english: It is well-known that lung cancer is caused at least in part by smoking too much.
sentences.chinese: 众所周知，肺癌至少部分是由于吸烟过多引起的。

sentences.english: It is well-known that cancer at least partly caused by over smoking.
sentences.chinese: 众所周知，肺癌至少部分地是由于吸烟过多引起的。

sentences.english: It is required that nobody (should) smoke in the reading-room.
sentences.chinese: 按要求，谁都不许在阅览室吸烟。

sentences.english: The problem is that 300 people are dying each day from illness caused by smoking.
sentences.chinese: 问题在于每天都有300人死于因吸烟而引起的疾病。

sentences.english: On Wednesday, the tobacconists went to on strike against the a new anti-smoking law.
sentences.chinese: 星期三，烟草制造商继续抗议政府的新反吸烟法。

sentences.english: Smoking is estimated to kill more than one million Chinese a year.
sentences.chinese: 据估计，中国每年有超过一百万的人死于吸烟。

sentences.english: Smokers needed a higher dose than non-smokers to derive any benefit from Viagra.
sentences.chinese: 烟民比非吸烟人士要服用较多伟哥才有反应。

sentences.english: Asking them if they prefer smoking or non-smoking table.
sentences.chinese: 并询问客人需要坐吸烟区还是无烟区。

sentences.english: That's because fewer women than men smoke or chew tobacco.
sentences.chinese: 这是因为吸烟或咀嚼烟草的女性少于男性。

sentences.english: Four in 10 smokers tried to quit smoking in the last year.
sentences.chinese: 而在过去的一年中，四成吸烟者曾试图戒烟。

sentences.english: You will also face heartbreak and abandonment by those you love.
sentences.chinese: 你同样吸烟削尖削尖时刻以及你深爱的人的抛弃。

definition: heavy drinking/to get drunk/to drink to excess
cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke
